description:
On my devstack, the nova-idmapshift usage outputs this:

vagrant@vagrant-ubuntu-trusty-64:~$ nova-idmapshift
usage: User Namespace FS Owner Shift [-h] [-u UID] [-g GID] [-n NOBODY] [-i]
                                     [-c] [-d] [-v]
                                     path
User Namespace FS Owner Shift: error: too few arguments

The usage should be  "nova-idmapshift [-h] ....." and not "User Namespace..."
title: nova-idmapshift outputs incorrect usage

comments.content:
On my devstack, the nova-idmapshift usage outputs this:

vagrant@vagrant-ubuntu-trusty-64:~$ nova-idmapshift
usage: User Namespace FS Owner Shift [-h] [-u UID] [-g GID] [-n NOBODY] [-i]
                                     [-c] [-d] [-v]
                                     path
User Namespace FS Owner Shift: error: too few arguments

The usage should be  "nova-idmapshift [-h] ....." and not "User Namespace..."
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~chuckcarmack75

comments.content: Actually this tool is used for  setting 'user namespaces with linux containers' may be that is the reason they have chosen this format
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~klkumar

comments.content:
I was comparing nova-idmapshift to nova-manage, and nova-manage puts its command name into the usage.  I think this is typical.

FYI - I'm working on https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1434866, which is to create a man page for nova-idmapshift.  This will give a description of the command.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~chuckcarmack75

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/218973

Branch:    master

commit 74e140faf23d07e23c33f707d2278679fbc5bbde
Author: Chuck Carmack <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Aug 31 18:10:27 2015 +0000

    Fix the usage output of the nova-idmapshift command
    
    The usage currently outputs:
    usage: User Namespace FS Owner Shift [-h] [-u UID] [-g GID] [-n NOBODY] [-i]
                                         [-c] [-d] [-v]
                                         path
    when it should be outputting:
    usage: nova-idmapshift .....
    
    Change-Id: Icb4c5cb30561b2dacc78d5fb6dc907089008fceb
    Closes-bug: 1475911
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
